text:
Hey <@UKH1SJ1L5>, if you’re using OAuth for this, you’ll need to specify the `integration-sync` scope when you do your auth flow
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/oauth2/initiate-oauth-integration>

You can (and probably should) also specify that scope in your application configuration page. That page also gives you a url block you can copy paste into your auth url
hm, if you’re using a hapikey, that implies the account you’re using does not have access. if you DM me your accountId, I can take a peak
Thank you for your reply, Sean. Yes, I am using a hapikey to install that.
Solved - Anish was using the Developer portals hapikey, when he wanted the accounts hapikey
